vecHighlight.strDescription: Defeat an opponent in a fistfight without taking any damage.
Find the baron's wife and daughter.

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Kill at least 5 opponents in under 10 seconds.
Kill 5 foes in a fight without taking damage (except for Toxicity) and without using the Quen Sign.
Read 30 books, journals or other documents.
Collect the formulae for 6 different bomb types.
Complete the contract on the shrieker.
Kill 50 opponents using the environment (e.g. swamp gas, insects or objects).
Resolve the doppler problem in Novigrad.

vecAchievedHidden.strDescription: Find the baron's wife and daughter.

data.item_description: Princess of Cintra, daughter of Pavetta and Duny (Urcheon of Erlenwald) and granddaughter of queen Calanthe.
A poet, minstrel, bard and the closest friend of Witcher Geralt of Rivia
The king of Wild Hunt, the lord of nightmares, and the force behind the mask of fright, only vague information about Eredin has coalsced into terrifying knowledge
Known to the elves as Gwynbleidd, and to those seeking his services as the White Wolf, Geralt is the master of swordfighting helping those in need
When one turns to a dictionary to look up the word "sorceress", there should be a little surprise to find a painting of Triss Merigold
A formidable sorceress, even though the intervening time has proved her relationship with Geralt to be strong, it is frequently as stormy as the waters off Undvik

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/292030/extras/EN_600x400.png?t=1668443314[/img]

If you buy this game, you will receive a free next-gen update on December 14th!

The Witcher: Wild Hunt is a story-driven open world RPG set in a visually stunning fantasy universe full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences. In The Witcher, you play as professional monster hunter Geralt of Rivia tasked with finding a child of prophecy in a vast open world rich with merchant cities, pirate islands, dangerous mountain passes, and forgotten caverns to explore.

[h2]KEY FEATURES[/h2]
[b]PLAY AS A HIGHLY TRAINED MONSTER SLAYER FOR HIRE[/b]
Trained from early childhood and mutated to gain superhuman skills, strength and reflexes, witchers are a counterbalance to the monster-infested world in which they live.

[list][*]Gruesomely destroy foes as a professional monster hunter armed with a range of upgradeable weapons, mutating potions and combat magic.
[*]Hunt down a wide range of exotic monsters — from savage beasts prowling the mountain passes, to cunning supernatural predators lurking in the shadows of densely populated towns.
[*]Invest your rewards to upgrade your weaponry and buy custom armour, or spend them away in horse races, card games, fist fighting, and other pleasures the night brings.[/list]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/292030/extras/W3_1.gif?t=1668443314[/img]

[b]EXPLORE A MORALLY INDIFFERENT FANTASY OPEN WORLD[/b]
Built for endless adventure, the massive open world of The Witcher sets new standards in terms of size, depth and complexity.

[list][*]Traverse a fantastical open world: explore forgotten ruins, caves and shipwrecks, trade with merchants and dwarven smiths in cities, and hunt across the open plains, mountains and seas.
[*]Deal with treasonous generals, devious witches and corrupt royalty to provide dark and dangerous services.
[*]Make choices that go beyond good & evil, and face their far-reaching consequences.[/list]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/292030/extras/W3_3.gif?t=1668443314[/img]

[b]CHASE DOWN THE CHILD OF PROPHECY[/b]
Take on the most important contract to track down the child of prophecy, a key to save or destroy this world.

[list][*]In times of war, chase down the child of prophecy, a living weapon foretold by ancient elven legends.
[*]Struggle against ferocious rulers, spirits of the wilds and even a threat from beyond the veil – all hell-bent on controlling this world.
[*]Define your destiny in a world that may not be worth saving.[/list]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/292030/extras/W3_2.gif?t=1668443314[/img]

[b]FULLY REALIZED NEXT GENERATION[/b]
[list][*]Built exclusively for next generation hardware, the REDengine 3 renders the world of The Witcher visually nuanced and organic, a real true to life fantasy.
[*]Dynamic weather systems and day/night cycles affect how the citizens of the towns and the monsters of the wilds behave.
[*]Rich with storyline choices in both main and subplots, this grand open world is influenced by the player unlike ever before.[/list]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/292030/extras/W3_4.gif?t=1668443314[/img]
data.strSnippet: As war rages on throughout the Northern Realms, you take on the greatest contract of your life — tracking down the Child of Prophecy, a living weapon that can alter the shape of the world.
